name: qrcode-generator
title: QR Code Generator
description: Generate QR code for an URL
author: Melvynx

commands.name: index
commands.title: Generate QR Code

commands.title: Generate QR Code From Clipboard
commands.description: Generate a QR Code from Clipboard and show it directly in Raycast
